html: Thing I keep coming back to on this Bryce Harper deal is ... 13 years, $330 is $25.4M per year. A ton of money, but not the kind of annual salary that will prevent the Phillies from doing anything they have to do in future years. Earlier this week, Nolan Arenado got a $32.5M AAV
text:
Thing I keep coming back to on this Bryce Harper deal is ... 13 years, $330 is $25.4M per year. A ton of money, but not the kind of annual salary that will prevent the Phillies from doing anything they have to do in future years.

Earlier this week, Nolan Arenado got a $32.5M AAV

html: Per @JeffPassan: Bryce Harper’s deal with the Philadelphia Phillies includes a no-trade clause. Combine that with the 13-year, $330 million term, and this much is clear: Bryce Harper is committed to being a Philadelphia Phillie for the rest of his career.
text:
Per @JeffPassan:
Bryce Harper’s deal with the Philadelphia Phillies includes a no-trade clause. Combine that with the 13-year, $330 million term, and this much is clear: Bryce Harper is committed to being a Philadelphia Phillie for the rest of his career.

Mike Trout is currently at 64.3 career WAR -- and is on pace to surpass 78.3 during the 2020 season.

html: Bryce Harper was MVP in 2015. In the 3 seasons since, he ranks 86th in WAR, just behind the likes of Corey Dickerson and Wil Myers. Of course, some of that is due to his defensive play. If you limit it strictly to offensive WAR -- he ranks 36th, just a tick behind Justin Upton.
text:
Bryce Harper was MVP in 2015.

In the 3 seasons since, he ranks 86th in WAR, just behind the likes of Corey Dickerson and Wil Myers. Of course, some of that is due to his defensive play.

If you limit it strictly to offensive WAR -- he ranks 36th, just a tick behind Justin Upton.

This Week in Philadelphia Sports: 

- Phillies, after passing on Machado, lose grip of Bryce Harper.

- Nick Foles is outright let go by the Eagles. 

FEEL THE EXCITEMENT.

text:
John Middleton storms into Scott Boras' office.

"Enough games. We'll pay anything for Bryce Harper."

(Boras spins around in a dark chair.)

"Who?" he laughs. "Why John, I've never heard of...Bryce Harper."

His walls are now filled with photos of Mike Trout.

Middleton screams.

The #Phillies know this.
